summary: Email chain between FBI agents discussing coordination to contact a witness in Sweden for an investigation involving Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. The New York case agent seeks guidance from FBI Legat Copenhagen on proper channels to interview the witness.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as a subject in an FBI investigation, along with Ghislaine Maxwell, regarding potential child exploitation/human trafficking.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as a subject in an FBI investigation, along with Jeffrey Epstein, regarding potential child exploitation/human trafficking.

connections.description: Both are named as subjects in the same FBI investigation into child exploitation/human trafficking.

events.title: FBI agent seeks to contact witness in Sweden
events.description: An FBI case agent from New York emails colleagues to coordinate contacting a witness in Sweden for an interview related to the Epstein/Maxwell investigation.

events.title: Coordination with Swedish National Police
events.description: FBI Legat Copenhagen contacts Swedish National Police to arrange proper legal channels for interviewing a witness in Sweden related to the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively investigating Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell for child exploitation/human trafficking as of January 2020.
There was a witness located in Sweden that the FBI sought to interview in connection with the Epstein/Maxwell case.
The FBI was coordinating through international channels (FBI Legat Copenhagen) to ensure proper legal procedures were followed when contacting the witness in Sweden.
The email chain shows ongoing investigative activity months after Epstein's death in August 2019.
The correspondence indicates the FBI's Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking unit in New York was leading this aspect of the investigation.
